text:
$name could be feeling pretty low about their work right now. $name has indicated that they are feeling neither challenged or skilled. It’s time to ask some critical questions and deep dive on what could be causing this. Do they need training? More attention? Different challenges?

While it could seem like less than an optimal place to be, probability says the only place to go now is… up! It’s time to initiate a radical change or plan some concrete steps to alleviate and improve upon their current status.
